entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Winchester
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:09 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.8°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 66 %

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning near noon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 late this evening then light overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
